list.name: target
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT target_ip FROM targets ORDER BY target_ip

targets.rawSql: SELECT h.hop_number AS hop, COUNT(*) as count FROM hops h JOIN measurements m ON m.id=h.measurement_id JOIN targets t ON t.id=m.target_id WHERE t.target_ip = CASE WHEN '${target}' = '' THEN t.target_ip ELSE '${target}' END GROUP BY hop ORDER BY hop

SELECT m.started_at as time, COUNT(h.id) as value FROM measurements m JOIN hops h ON h.measurement_id=m.id JOIN targets t ON t.id=m.target_id WHERE t.target_ip = CASE WHEN '${target}' = '' THEN t.target_ip ELSE '${target}' END GROUP BY m.started_at ORDER BY time
